name: Movie Explorer
tagline: A sample solution demonstrating best practices for building cross platform mobile applications using Xamarin
body:
Building cross platform mobile applications is pretty straight forward with Xamarin. This solution demonstrates a simple movie explorer app, which lets you view a list of movies, and select one to view details and optionally save it for later. 

Highlights of this solution:
* PCL for common code
* Platform specific class libraries for unit-testable components
* Advanced customization of UI elements
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
